I don't give a crap if a character is gay or trans\, but what matters is that they are wrote as a human being first not just some token character that we get so much of in today's media\, but what we got was this....trainwreck.As I said I wanted to like this game\, I really did. This game had the potential to tell a great story. It tells a story\, but the story it tells fell flat for me. Without going into details\, I love a revenge plot. I have seen so many in movies and other games\, but this one dropped the ball hard.  However\, I am not wanting to spoil the game for anyone out of respect for the players\, not the company or its marketing.This could have been a great sequel if it wasn't handled so poorly. Abby could have been a good character if they handled it better\, Joel was all-but squandered\, but Ellie I enjoyed. It was good to see her grow up\, but then the last half of the game.....urgh.That's why I have to give this game a 4. Graphically its fine\, a good 7 out of 10\, Gameplay is the same 7 out of 10\,  Story is an abysmal 3 out of 10. If this was a different IP I might have scored it higher with a 5 out of 10 or a 6. Yet\, this is not a new IP. This is a sequel to one of the best games I have played and one that I have finished more than once just to find things i may have missed the first time.
